dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2021, the U.S. added over 92 tons of gold to its reserves, bringing it up to more than 9,000 tons total.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty one, the U.S. added over ninety two tons of gold to its reserves, bringing it up to more than nine thousand tons total.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The United States which holds the highest reserves globally, added 92.23 tons, increasing its haul to 9,057.38 tons from 8,965.15 tons. As of December 2020, France had the fifth-highest gold reserves at 2,684.22 tons, after liquidating 0.76 tons from the 2,684.98 tons held in March.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Germany's still in second place, but they actually liquidated a bit—like 5.5 tons—so they're sitting at around 3,704 tons now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Germany's still in second place, but they actually liquidated a bit-like five point five tons-so they're sitting at around three thousand, seven hundred four tons now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Germany is second with 3,703.74 tons of Gold, having liquidated 5.4 tons from March's 3,709.14 tons.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and the IMF is holding steady too, though they also sold off a small amount—about 1.2 tons.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and the I M F is holding steady too, though they also sold off a small amount-about one point two tons.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Monetary Fund holds 3,100.38 tons in gold reserves, while back in March, the figure stood at 3,101.53 tons. The institution has liquidated a total of 1.1 tons of the precious metal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, 'cause Russia actually increased their reserves by more than 66 tons during that same period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, 'cause Russia actually increased their reserves by more than sixty six tons during that same period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Russia holds 2,569.72 tons in gold reserves, an addition of 65.51 tons on the 2,504.21 tons held in March.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and China upped theirs by almost 38 tons as well. Seems like some were buying while others were trimming.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and China upped theirs by almost thirty eight tons as well. Seems like some were buying while others were trimming.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: China has upped its reserves by 36.75 tons to 2,196.55 tons as of December 2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—Finbold.com pointed out that when the pandemic hit, a lot of countries started this new dash toward gold.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: the website pointed out that when the pandemic hit, a lot of countries started this new dash toward gold.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Finbold.com researchers commented on the gold purchasing trend during the pandemic. According to the researchers: When the pandemic hit, most countries began a new dash towards Gold.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense, right? With all that money printing by central banks, gold's that intrinsic value reassurance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense, right? With all that money printing by central banks, gold's that intrinsic value reassurance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The dash came in the backdrop of central banks printing massive amounts of money to stimulate the global economy. Notably, Gold continues to have an intrinsic value reassuring countries of good returns in case of heightened inflation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And even though some European nations like Italy and France sold small amounts, they're still holding huge reserves.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And even though some European nations like Italy and France sold small amounts, they're still holding huge reserves.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Italy is fourth with 2,701.63 tons, having liquidated 0.76 tons from March's 2,702.39 tons. As of December 2020, France had the fifth-highest gold reserves at 2,684.22 tons, after liquidating 0.76 tons from the 2,684.98 tons held in March.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Switzerland and Japan also reduced their holdings slightly, but India actually gained nearly 15 tons.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Switzerland and Japan also reduced their holdings slightly, but India actually gained nearly fifteen tons.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Switzerland has liquidated about 0.83 tons to record 1,145.29 tons as of December. Japan currently sits on 841.46 tons in gold reserves after liquidating 1.52 tons. India has gained 13.85 tons in Gold to put its current figure at 699.88 tons.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So it's not a uniform trend—some are accumulating, others are maybe rebalancing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's not a uniform trend-some are accumulating, others are maybe rebalancing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's Bitcoin and other alternatives mentioned too—gold isn't the only safe haven getting attention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's Bitcoin and other alternatives mentioned too-gold isn't the only safe haven getting attention.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With alternative assets such as gold and Bitcoin thriving in th...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, but gold's been the classic go-to for centuries, so these moves aren't too surprising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but gold's been the classic go-to for centuries, so these moves aren't too surprising.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, seeing those exact numbers—like the Netherlands liquidating over a ton—it's pretty detailed stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, seeing those exact numbers-like the Netherlands liquidating over a ton-it's pretty detailed stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Netherlands gold reserves currently stand at 673.64 tons, having liquated 1.14 trillion from the original haul of 674.78 tons from March.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely makes you wonder what the next big shift will be, especially with inflation concerns.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely makes you wonder what the next big shift will be, especially with inflation concerns.
